title: The Pursuit of Happiness: 21 Spiritual Rules to Sucess
description: What is the most desired thing sought after in life? It is not money, it is not even love, it is happiness! Everyone is searching for happiness. This book is a mini-course outlining 21 spiritual rules to finding success when you are in "The Pursuit of Happiness." The book was designed with a specific purpose, as a guide to help you tap into your natural ability to be happy. Everyone has the ability to find happiness in his or her life, yet sometimes you need a road map. "The Pursuit of Happiness" is your spiritual road map. Learn to enjoy the journey!
author: Jennifer O'Neill
